<title level="1" right="Hazard 7" pfs="">[Boulder Deadfall Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=93)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 40</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A weight-sensitive plate buried underneath sand pulls a boulder over a cliff ledge, causing it to fall on targets within the entrance.

---

**Stealth**
DC 25 (trained); DC 0 to spot the balanced boulders

**Disable**
DC 27 [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) (expert) or DC 25 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (expert) to find and disconnect the plate from the tipping mechanism

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Deadfall** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature enters the area without taking care to avoid the hidden trigger plate; **Effect** Creatures within 10 feet of the cave entrance take 4d10+18 damage (DC 25 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

---
**Reset**
Resetting the boulders in the trap is a labor-intensive project that takes 2 hours.
name: Boulder Deadfall Trap
